question:

(d) State three precautions that should be taken when using specimens S.
answer:
(a)

  • P: It is used for lightening farmhouses, It can also be used for brooding of chicks. It can be used for candling of eggs.
  • Q: Hand Trowel: It is used to apply fertilizer, It is used to transplant seedling. It is used for nursery practices & light Weeding, t is used for digging holes for Garden fork. it is used for turning manure during compost making. - It is used for loosening the soil before transplanting. - It is used for loading manure it is used for loading hay.

question:
Study specimens V (EARTH WORM), W (PADDY RICE), X (GROUNDNUT SEEDS) and Y (MAIZE STEM BORER) carefully and answer the following questions.

(a) State four ways in which specimen V is important in Agriculture.

(b) Outline the steps involved in processing each of specimens W and X into polished rice and groundnut cake respectively.

(c) Mention three measures used in controlling specimen Y on a farm
answer:
(a) It is important in agriculture because Earthworm aerate the soil. It helps to improve soil structure Through burrowing they leave holes for crop root penetration. They improve soil water percolation or drainage.

(b) W (PADDY RICE);

  • Sundrying: Dry the fresh rice for 3-4 days.
  • Threshing: use either manual or mechanical threshers to separate shafts from grains.
  • Winnowing: This is used to remove dust shafts from stalk or grains.
  • Parboiling: This is used to reduce breakage of grain, The paddy rice is boiled for about 12-15 hrs. The husks are easily removed 
  • Hulling; This is the removal of the husks from the grains.
  • Polishing involves the use to specially designed machines to remove the husk and that layers Covering the grains polishing also involves removal of rice grain which is very Proteins and rich in Vitamins.

X (GROUNDNUT SEEDS)

  • Harvested nuts should be dried properly. The seeds are removed from the shells by Pounding them slightly with mortal or by beating them with sticks.
  • Small shelling or decorticating machine can be used to remove the seeds from the fruit

 

(c) Plant resistant variety, early planting spray the farm with insectiales e.g. Gammalin 20. Uproot and burn the crop, practice crop rotation
